injury.name: Delerium
injury.description: * While you have Delerium, you are **Dull**. * You can not use "Clever" skills. * If you were already Dull: now, you cannot use any skills at all. * This overrides any character traits you might already have (if you were Clever, now you are Dull). * A successful Hard AID (First Aid) check can downgrade this to Confusion. * This check can be retried. * After two nights of rest, downgrade this to Massive, Painful Scar. * Take 4 Corruption Points to instantly heal Delerium.
